Package net.krglok.realms.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bank  
    Barrack
    not yet implemented
    BoardItem
    a row of a statistic
    BoardItemList
    hold multible rows of a statistik, each row is a different item
    Building
    realize the building of a settlement and hold settlers and make production the building have different types in the settlement they include a region from herostronghold for the buildup requirements and the production recipe
    BuildingList
    Verwaltet eine Liste von Buildings der key ist die Building id zusätzlich wird eine liste der buildings vom typ region und eine Liste der buildings von typ superregion geführt
    ConfigBasis
    class for define static values (constants)
    Item
    Independent type for blocks and items make it possible to separate the model from the minecraft server property: String sRef; Integer iValue;
    ItemArray
    list of items, can hold multiple items of the same type
    ItemList
    list of items, hold each item type unique
    ItemPrice
    item with a price for pricelist and tradeorder property: String sRef; Integer iValue; Double basePrice;
    ItemPriceList
    list of items with prices , used as central pricelist
    LocationData
    Independent location definition, seperate the model from minecraft server
    Owner
    owner data for the settlement, kingdom all activitys and permissions based on the ownership and the the level of ownnership - nobleLevel are significant for Kingdoms and feudal - commonLevel are significant for Settlements the key for a owner is th uuid of the player. in case of npc the name or none
    OwnerList
    realize a list of all owners in the model.
    Resident
    hold the human resources of a settlement calculate birthrate and deathrate calculate happines based on settlerCount
    RouteOrder
    Die routeOrder ist eine SendOrder d.h. der Absender generiert den Auftrag.
    RouteOrderList  
    Settlement
    represent the whole settlement the central object settlement based on the superregion and region of HeroStronghold incorporate the the rules for production, fertility and money simulation of residents and workers make trading and train units for military the production will be started from an external task, every ingame day there are some Managers incorporated to give the settlement the possibility to ruled by a NPC hint: the settle dont have a kingdomId , only the owner has a kingdomId
    SettlementList
    the settlementList hold all settlements in the model settlements are the basic elements of the model, realize the urban object
    SignPos
    hold the registered signs of a settlement as List of objects - BuildingId - position - text[4] The standard sign text are structured 0 = BuildingType 1 = Status (enable/disable) 2 = free 3 = free Some sign have a formatted text, 0 = [KEYWORD] 1 = free 2 = free 3 = free
    SignPosList  
    Townhall
    Control the workers of the settlement
    TradeMarket
    Hier werden zentral die Angebote der Trader gespeichert und verwaltet.
    TradeMarketOrder
    this are the Sell orders in the trademarket.
    TradeOrder
    Die TraderTransaction ist die Basis fuer das Handelssystem.
    TradeOrderList
    hold a list of trade orders will be used from traders in settlement
    Trader
    Der Trader ist kein Gebaeude, sondern ein Manager der Handel abwickelt.
    TradeTransport
    Hier werden zentral die Transporte der Trader abgewickelt.
    Warehouse
    make the item storage and the processing for the storage will be used in settlement and regiment
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommonLevel
    these are the none noble level of owner
    NobleLevel
    these are the noble level of owners.
    SettleType
    this are the types of settlements build in a hierarchical List of values
    TradeStatus
    defines the process steps for trade orders
    TradeType
    define the type of trade orders
